plotnum2grid(nrows=None, ncols=None, num=None)[source]
Info:

Takes the number of axes you want and creates a grid, one can constrain either the number of rows or colums to make the grid. If Neither is specified, will create the smallest sqaure grid to fit.

Parameters:

  • nrows (int) – number of rows to keep constant

  • ncols (int) – number of columns to keep constant

  • num (int) – number of axes to make into grid

Returns:

number of rows of new grid grid_ncols (int): number of columns of new grid

Return type:

grid_nrows (int)

save_data(data, filename: str)[source]
stitch_components_together(x_list, y_list=None)[source]
Info:

Stitch data together, in the case that the x data segments are not contiguous, the difference between samples, assuming contigous within each segment, will be used to pad segments together with zeros

Parameters:

  • x_list (list) – List of data segments to patch together

  • y_list (list) – Optional, Also patch y list together, will follow x patching and stitch data along last axis

Returns:

patched x data array y_patch (ndarray): Optional, patched y data array

Return type:

x_patch (ndarray)
